item.title: C Level 2 Test
item.description:
<div class="highlight"><pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-c" data-lang="c"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="err">题目</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="err">：</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="err">设某棵树的度为</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="err">，其中度为</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="err">、</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="err">、</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="err">的结点个数分别为</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="err">、</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="err">、</span><span class="mi">15</span><span class="err">。则该树中总结点数为</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">A</span><span class="p">.</span> <span class="mi">22</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">B</span><span class="p">.</span> <span class="mi">30</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">C</span><span class="p">.</span> <span class="mi">35</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">D</span><span class="p">.</span> <span class="err">不可能有这样的树</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="err">分析：按照结点计算公式，树的总结点</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="err">树的边数</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="err">度</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="err">个数</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="err">度</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="err">个数…</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="err">。所以该树总结点数应为</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">15</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">11</span><span class="err">，然而由于数的总结点数</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="err">叶子结点数</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">11</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">15</span><span class="o">=-</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="err">，很明显，这样的树不存在，故选</span><span class="n">D</span><span class="err">。</span></span></span></code></pre></div>

item.title: 发布网站步骤
item.description:
<p>在此步骤中，你将发布你的网站，但不会 部署 它。</p>
<p>当你发布站点时，Hugo 在项目根目录的 public 目录中创建整个静态站点。这包括 HTML 文件以及图像、CSS 文件和 JavaScript 文件等资源。</p>
<p>当你发布网站时，你通常不希望包含 草稿、未来或过期的内容，命令很简单。
quote:</p>

item.title: 博客简介
item.description:
<!-- raw HTML omitted -->
<p>博客（英语：Blog）是一种在线日记型式的个人网站，借由张帖子章、图片或视频来记录生活、抒发情感或分享信息。博客上的文章通常根据张贴时间，以倒序方式由新到旧排列。
quote:</p>
